themes: direct funding to marginalized community groups
transparency in funding timelines and decision-making
key_phrases: Get money in the hands of community groups made marginalized
Provide additional coaching or resources for organizations that did not receive grant funds

insufficient support for organizations not receiving grants
lack of transparency in funding process and timelines

provide coaching or resources to unsuccessful grant applicants
increase transparency in timelines and decision-making for cultural programming
